Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:@/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentName.description: The name configured for the agent. Text reference used to identify the agent in the console.
AgentName.markdownDescription:
The name configured for the agent. Text reference used to identify the agent in the console.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:@/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

ActivationKey.markdownDescription:
Activation key of the Agent.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 29  
Pattern: [A-Z0-9]{5}(-[A-Z0-9]{5}){4}  
Update requires: Replacement

SecurityGroupArns.description: The ARNs of the security group used to protect your data transfer task subnets.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):ec2:[a-z\-0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:security-group/.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

SecurityGroupArns.markdownDescription:
The ARNs of the security group used to protect your data transfer task subnets.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

SubnetArns.description: The ARNs of the subnets in which DataSync will create elastic network interfaces for each data transfer task.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):ec2:[a-z\-0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:subnet/.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

SubnetArns.markdownDescription:
The ARNs of the subnets in which DataSync will create elastic network interfaces for each data transfer task.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

VpcEndpointId.description: The ID of the VPC endpoint that the agent has access to.
VpcEndpointId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the VPC endpoint that the agent has access to.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^vpce-[0-9a-f]{17}$  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

EndpointType.description: The service endpoints that the agent will connect to.
EndpointType.markdownDescription:
The service endpoints that the agent will connect to.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: FIPS | PUBLIC | PRIVATE_LINK  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentArn.markdownDescription:
The DataSync Agent ARN.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:agent/agent-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption
